sections.title: Smart Document Recognition: Instantly Identify Uploaded Documents
sections.content: Empower your document management process with Smart Document Recognition. This advanced feature swiftly identifies the type of document you upload, making document handling effortless and efficient.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content:
Upload Your Document: Select the document you wish to process using the provided file upload button. 

 Intelligent Analysis: Our system employs cutting-edge technology to analyze the documents structure, layout, and content. 

 Automatic Identification: Based on the analysis, Smart Document Recognition accurately identifies the document type, whether its an identification document, real estate document, 401k document or any other document format. 

 Streamlined Processing: With the document type identified, our platform can seamlessly route it to the appropriate workflow or apply predefined actions, saving you valuable time and effort.

sections.title: What Problem it Solves
sections.content:
Efficiency: Instantly recognize document types without manual intervention. 

 Accuracy: Ensure accurate processing and categorization of documents. 

 Productivity: Automate document handling workflows for smoother operations.

sections.title: Value
sections.content: eVaults are smart and can support automation of client interactions as well as parallel internal ops process. Saves ops time, cleaner data, nudges for clients as well as for internal staff.
